This class will extend on the mathematical probability and statistics course.  We will learn

* The R scripting language.
* T-test, analysis of variance, k means method
* Introduction to various technologies including NGS and microarray
* Diagnostic Tests
* Linkage disequilibrium
* Covariance Matrix
* Maximum Likelihood
* Normalization
* Bayesian Network
* Implementation of the above methods

Grades will be broken as such:

30% participation  
40% homework  
30% final exam  

There is no official textbook for the course that we will be following.
